title: Victory in the West = Sieg im Westen
brief_description: The official German army film, covering its campaigns in Belgium, Holland and France in May and June of 1940. An army film on the conquest of the Low Countries and France, using authentic material. The campaign is explained in detail with maps. Silent film.
